posts.post_content:
Fellow T205 collectors, let's see if we can make this a running thread going forward. Post your T205 want lists and possibly some cards you have available for sale/trade. 


Anyone out there working on a set? Let's hear about what cards you need!

Here is what I need in VG/EX condition: 

Devore
Dickson
Donohue
Gray
Hanford
Johnson
Joss
Konetchy
Lennox
McAllister
Merritt
Turner
Young

Here is what I have available for trade:

Barger (Partial "B"), Piedmont 42 - SGC 55
Barger (Full "B") - SGC 55
Cady - SGC 50
Carrigan - SGC 50
Groom - SGC 50
Hoblitzell (Cin. After 1908) - SGC 50
B. Lord - SGC 20
Olmstead - SGC 40
Paskert - SGC 45
Phelps - SGC 45

Wiltse (Right Ear), Piedmont 42 - PSA 4.5

SOLD or TRADED

[S]Adkins - SGC 60[/S]
[S]Downey - SGC 30 (looks like a 5)[/S]
[S]Dunn - SGC 50[/S]
[S]T. Jones - SGC 50[/S]
[S]Nee - SGC 50[/S]
[S]Phelan - SGC 60[/S]
[S]Raymond - SGC 30[/S]
[S]K. White, Piedmont 42 - SGC 20[/S]

I have the following extra T205s for trade:

VG to VG-EX: 
- Beals Becker - Polar Bear
- Larry Doyle - Polar Bear
- Clyde Engle - Sweet Caporal Black
- William Foxen - Sweet Caporal Red
- Amby McConnell - Piedmont
- John Titus - Polar Bear
- Lee Tannehill - Honest Long Cut

GD-VG:
- Clyde Engle - Piedmont
- George Graham Rustlers - Polar Bear
- Arthur Fletcher - Piedmont
- Billy Payne - Piedmont
- Frank Schulte - Piedmont
- David Shean Rustlers - Piedmont

Barger 
Barger (partial)
Hoblitzell
T.Jones
Nee

I’m looking to upgrade any of the 5 above.
Jones and Nee would be prioritized since the ones I have are a little ugly.
I’ve got to dig through my extras to see what I might have from your list. I  have some Dead President trading material if you were inclined to add those to your collection as well...

Short list here but wants are as follows:

T205 American Beauty Cigarettes 
Chance
Kroh
McIntire

T205 Piedmont 42
Overall

Available cards

T205 James Archer SGC 40 Sweet Caporal factory 25
T205 James T Sheckard Hassan factory 649 raw (nice card just have not taken the time to get graded)
T205 Lena Blackburne American Beauty PSA 1
T205 James T Sheckard American Beauty SGC 20
,
PM or email at [url]cubkmac32@aol.com[/url]

I don't currently have anything to sell or trade, but I'm looking to acquire low-grade copies of the following to complete my basic set:

Bransfield
Bresnahan (Mouth open)
Dougherty

Killian

Wilhelm

I've finally compiled a list of my extra slabbed T205.
I'd like to try trading for other cards I like/need, like E cards or HOFers.
If I am unable to strike trades, I'd consider selling. I havent scanned or priced all of them yet though, I'm just gauging interest.
